testsuite.name: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: When I choose "Essay" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: Then I see the "Essay" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: When I click on the "Essay" Question Widget and delete it in the question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: Then I don't see the "Essay" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: When I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: When I choose "Essay" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: Then I see the "Essay" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: When I move the cursor after the "Essay" Question Widget and delete it in the question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor

testcase.name: Then I don't see the "Essay" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test deleting span response areas in the editor
